paragraph1: You'll need to upload your receipts or invoices from a computer, phone or tablet. You'll have the option to upload more than one if you need to.

ol.li1: Choose the file you want to upload

paragraph3: Check that the file you want to upload is in the correct file format before uploading. Files can be PNG, JPEG, PDF, DOC or DOCX. Make sure that the document is not password protected.
label: Choose file

errors.tooLarge: The selected file must be smaller than 10MB
errors.invalidType: The selected file must be PNG, JPEG, PDF, DOC or DOCX

uploadError.passwordProtected: The file cannot be uploaded because it is password protected.
uploadError.virusDetected: The file cannot be uploaded because it contains a virus.
uploadError.failed: The selected file could not be uploaded â€“ try again.
